titleStmt.title: Jackson's recantation, or, The life & death of the notorious high-way-man, now hanging in chains at Hampstead delivered to a friend a little before execution : wherein is truly discovered the whole mystery of that wicked and fatal profession of padding on the road.
titleStmt.author: Head, Richard, 1637?-1686?

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
